That is particularly true in China, where the protections are the weakest, Steve Ballmer told the paper. What: Barbara Walters , who had her own surgery to repair a faulty heart valve last year, addresses heart disease and the fear many have of a heart operation in A Matter of Life and Death. She talks to former Bill Clinton , David Letterman , Robin Williams and Regis Philbin , celebrities who've had heart surgeries. She also talks to doctors, including her own, about prevention and the warning signs of heart trouble.

leaders in Congress are serious about introducing legislation that would allow states, for the first time, to enter bankruptcy court.
